title: WHIRLING F3 / BARRED DOOR
description:
This is the door on the roof. 
Phys Inst white get in

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "This is the door to the pinball wor..."
dialogueTree.text: This is the door to the pinball workshop that you left barred on the inside.

links.title: You: "Push."
links.text: Push.

links.title: Barred Door: "It's barred from the inside. You he..."
links.text: It's barred from the inside. You hear the bar rattle in the brackets.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Sounds like it's heavy too. Very st..."
links.text: Sounds like it's heavy too. Very sturdy.

links.title: Logic: "Must be something valuable inside t..."
links.text: Must be something valuable inside to go through the trouble of protecting it -- the door is very sturdy indeed.

links.title: You: ""Where does this lead to?""
links.text: "Where does this lead to?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To the workshop behind the wall."..."
links.text: "To the workshop behind the wall." He points somewhere within. "This must be the barred door we saw -- we *could* return and open it from the inside." He looks at the door with suspicion.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It must be connected to the room w..."
links.text: "It must be connected to the room we found behind the kitchen door. Maybe we should go back and take that elevator up..." He looks at the door with suspicion.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know." He makes a note in..."
links.text: "I don't know." He makes a note in his notebook.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is not the first closed door we..."
links.text: "It is not the first closed door we've found in this building -- there is also your mysterious blue kitchen door."

links.title: You: ""Do you think it's important?""
links.text: "Do you think it's important?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. The further we get,..."
links.text: "I don't know. The further we get, the more this building seems to be tied to the case..."

links.title: Shivers: "Below, the hostel-cafeteria creaks..."
links.text: Below, the hostel-cafeteria creaks and groans under your added weight -- a skeleton of composite support beams and cantilevers.

links.title: You: "Tap on the roof with your foot."
links.text: Tap on the roof with your foot.

links.title: Shivers: "A dull thump. Somewhere inside a wi..."
links.text: A dull thump. Somewhere inside a wind brace rattles from the imperceptible motion of the building.

links.title: You: "Shake it off."
links.text: Shake it off.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The vigilantes, the cadaver, and....."
links.text: "The vigilantes, the cadaver, and..." He nods to where they young woman once stood. "A number of people connected to the case are *in* or around this building. This door is part of it. It's not *unimportant*."

links.title: You: ""So maybe the door below *is* a *me..."
links.text: "So maybe the door below *is* a *mega*-investigation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No -- still a mini-investigation."..."
links.text: "No -- still a mini-investigation." He pretends to make a note in his notebook.

links.title: You: ""See? The main investigation and th..."
links.text: "See? The main investigation and the door below are merging into a *stereo*-investigation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hate it when that happens.""
links.text: "I hate it when that happens."

links.title: You: ""I could say something, but I'm not..."
links.text: "I could say something, but I'm not going to, because I don't gloat."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He doesn't say anything."
links.text: He doesn't say anything.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You should have gloated."
links.text: You should have gloated.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The vigilantes, the cadaver, and....."
links.text: "The vigilantes, the cadaver, and..." He nods toward the young woman. "A number of people connected to the case are *in* or around this building. This door is part of it. It's not *unimportant*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The further we get, the more this..."
links.text: "The further we get, the more this building seems to be tied to the case..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should search downstairs, in th..."
links.text: "We should search downstairs, in the kitchen -- just in case. Maybe there's a door that leads up, that we don't know of."

links.title: You: "Kick the door in."
links.text: Kick the door in.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Something cracks inside. It is an u..."
links.text: Something cracks inside. It is an unbelievably satisfying sound.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Filling you with a *belief* in your..."
links.text: Filling you with a *belief* in your own body.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sounds like the property damage wa..."
links.text: "Sounds like the property damage wasn't in vain, at least. Would it hurt to look in?"

links.title: You: ""I thought it was an Ace's High mom..."
links.text: "I thought it was an Ace's High moment, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know about that..." The li..."
links.text: "I don't know about that..." The lieutenant smiles an uncomfortable smile.

links.title: Empathy: "It totally was."
links.text: It totally was.

links.title: You: ""I thought it was an Ace's Low mome..."
links.text: "I thought it was an Ace's Low moment, Kim."

links.title: You: ""Let's see." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's see." [Leave.]

links.title: Visual Calculus: "It seems like the brackets broke in..."
links.text: It seems like the brackets broke inside.

links.title: You: "Let's get in there. [Leave.]"
links.text: Let's get in there. [Leave.]

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I think the brackets broke inside...."
links.text: "I think the brackets broke inside. I've always wanted to know what's in there..."

links.title: Empathy: "She sounds genuinely curious."
links.text: She sounds genuinely curious.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Something cracks inside. It is an u..."
links.text: Something cracks inside. It is an unbelievably satisfying sound.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Nice." The young woman nods."
links.text: "Nice." The young woman nods.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Something cracks inside."
links.text: Something cracks inside.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It is an unbelievably satisfying so..."
links.text: It is an unbelievably satisfying sound.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Something cracks inside."
links.text: Something cracks inside.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It is an unbelievably satisfying so..."
links.text: It is an unbelievably satisfying sound.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You kick it -- gung ho style, *ente..."
links.text: You kick it -- gung ho style, *entering the premises* style -- but the door fails to respect the force. All you hear is the bar rattling inside, laughing at you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't see how this is going to g..."
links.text: "I don't see how this is going to give new results." He measures the door, stoically. "There must be another way in there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's the barred door we saw." He l..."
links.text: "It's the barred door we saw." He looks at the door with suspicion. "I don't know why we didn't open it from the inside -- we *should*."

links.title: Logic: "The key... to the kitchen door. Fro..."
links.text: The key... to the kitchen door. From behind the window. Use it on the door.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Below... in the Union box... was th..."
links.text: Below... in the Union box... was there something behind the window? In the hawthorn branches, brushing against the glass.

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Inland Empire: "No one knows. It is a fleeting feel..."
links.text: No one knows. It is a fleeting feeling.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "It could be that your eyesight is s..."
links.text: It could be that your eyesight is still too poor to notice it... behind that window.

links.title: You: "Ignore the feeling."
links.text: Ignore the feeling.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You are a numb, imprecise instrumen..."
links.text: You are a numb, imprecise instrument to ignore this feeling...

links.title: You: ""How?""
links.text: "How?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Through the kitchen door, perhaps?..."
links.text: "Through the kitchen door, perhaps? Let's explore, rather than destroy."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "It could be that your eyesight is s..."
links.text: It could be that your eyesight is still too poor to notice it... behind that window.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should search downstairs. There..."
links.text: "We should search downstairs. There are things about this building we don't know yet."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The door has withstood your *demol..."
links.text: "The door has withstood your *demolishing* attempts." He measures the door, stoically. "There must be another way in."

links.title: You: ""Fucking piece of shit!""
links.text: "Fucking piece of shit!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "The door is oblivious to your distr..."
links.text: The door is oblivious to your distress.

links.title: Half Light: "Your foot is ready to explode and p..."
links.text: Your foot is ready to explode and punish this *object*!

links.title: You: ""*Disrespecting* the force?!?!" (Ki..."
links.text: "*Disrespecting* the force?!?!" (Kick the door.)

links.title: Barred Door: "The door receives a thorough discip..."
links.text: The door receives a thorough disciplining.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Its pain and grovelling is much to..."
links.text: Its pain and grovelling is much to your liking.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Suck on that, door.""
links.text: "Suck on that, door."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "This kind of stuff would hurt -- if..."
links.text: This kind of stuff would hurt -- if not for you not caring about little things like that.

links.title: Barred Door: "The door receives a thorough discip..."
links.text: The door receives a thorough disciplining -- and it doesn't even hurt!

links.title: Barred Door: "The door receives a thorough discip..."
links.text: The door receives a thorough disciplining -- at the cost of your foot. Your foot hurts. A lot.

links.title: You: "Swallow the rage."
links.text: Swallow the rage.

links.title: Barred Door: "The sturdy wood door has lost *all*..."
links.text: The sturdy wood door has lost *all* respect for you.

links.title: You: ""Ow.""
links.text: "Ow."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You kick it -- gung ho-style, *ente..."
links.text: You kick it -- gung ho-style, *entering the premises*-style -- but the door fails to respect the force. All you hear is the bar rattling inside, laughing at you.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The woman takes a drag of her ziggi..."
links.text: The woman takes a drag of her ziggie and nods: "Demolish the place."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't see how this is going to g..."
links.text: "I don't see how this is going to give new results." He measures the door, stoically. "There must be another way in there."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""All right," the woman nods approvi..."
links.text: "All right," the woman nods approvingly: "Let's trash the place."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's not.""
links.text: "Let's not."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "This is a small, heavy door. There..."
dialogueTree.text: This is a small, heavy door. There is no lock in sight.
